feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.115.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add actor to secret version history by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3191
  • feat: get secret by ID by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3181
  • fix: address unhandled promise rejects causing 502s by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3202
  • misc: add uncaught exception handler by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3203
  • Feat/add secret name to slack notification by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3195
  • Added webhook trigger for secret reminder by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.114.0-postgres...infisical/v0.115.0-postgres
